Class PIDController

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnglePIDController

    public class PIDController
extends ErrorController
    An ErrorController implemented with a simple Proportional-(limited)Integral-Derivative controller
    Author:
    hughest1

      • PIDController

        public PIDController(java.lang.String name,
                     double kp,
                     double ki,
                     double kd,
                     double integralLifespan)
        Creates a new PID controller.
        Parameters:
        kp - the proportional gain
        ki - the integral gain
        maxIInfluence - the maximum influence the integral is allowed to have on the response
        kd - the derivative gain
